item.title: IELTS Speaking Vocabulary for Clothes
item.author: Young
item.description: Vocabulary it is in vogue: Currently popular or in fashion. it is fashionable: Stylish and currently popular. it is one of a kind: Unique; unlike anything else. it is trendy: Currently popular or in style. casual/formal clothes: Outfits suitable for everyday wear or relaxed settings (casual) versus outfits suitable for formal events or occasions (formal). fashion is a cycle: Fashion trends tend to repeat or come back after certain periods. flamboyant clothes: Bright, colorful, and often ostentatious clothing.
